pr_title: Update: Require newer save loads to upgrade engine

timeline.message: Remove unnecessary null check, new input stream will thrown NPE on the next line

Return an optional instead of throwing an exception on game load

Rather than control-flow-by-exception, we return an optional and have
the lower layers take care of error handling and notifications.
Finish converting game loading to return an optional and handle thrown errors

Do not load future save game versions, only prompt user to upgrade their engine

There are subtle risks with playing a *maybe* forward compatible version of TripleA
with a new save. To help ensure rule integrity, this update removes a yes/no prompt
for users to continue in such situations and instead instructs them to download
a newer game engine.
Fix html formatting of load newer save game message
